After Stress Schizophrenia

May 2012

Fearing future is stress. Not understanding present is schizophrenia.

Marketers call it multitasking but in fact real time young people does not understand what is happening to them.

Lost today is the same, I hope not worse, like it was being afraid of tomorrow.

Existential insecurity just transformed into perceptional insecurity. It seems nothing changes below the line just rhymes.

This story is about fear. With focus on stress, schizophrenia, integrity, rhythm, speed.
Advertising
Metaprogramming
